TopicTitle: The Wonderful Adventures of Evel Kerman - An Introduction

Articles.Content:
Best watched in HD.

I really think this one needs some more episodes. I plan to take Evel to many, many places in our known universe.

Wonderful work! Very evocative, great shots and choice of music. Particularly liked the yellowish lighting. I think the shot from 0:26 to 0:53 was a touch on the long side though, could have used another cut in there maybe?

could have used another cut in there maybe?

I like that one long. Although if I did it again I would take a longer shot and then speed it up so the ground doesn't look slow/weird.

I don't trust him. After all of the trailers he made: kerbal space program: the movie,sunset.

Now you better make this one.

Hahaha! I've already taken some footage of Evel on Duna.

(Low gravity makes it very difficult to control the bike!)

EDIT: Also, thanks for the feedback guys and girls. It helps me tune the videos each time.

Edited October 8, 2012 by coinslot
Duna, not mun...
